contentrichtext.text: {{orphan|date=July 2009}} '''YLE Nyheter''' is the [[Swedish language]] online news service of the [[Finland|Finnish]] national broadcaster [[Yleisradio]] (YLE). Generally speaking it is only updated during the daytime hours (i.e. no new stories are added during the night, unless there is an exceptional event). Until August 2007, the service was called Internytt. ==See also== *[[TV-nytt]] ==External links== *http://svenska.yle.fi/nyheter {{DEFAULTSORT:Yle Nyheter}} [[Category:News websites]] {{website-stub}}
